item.title: Need Two Commands Made For ::yell (will Rep++ If they work)
item.dc:creator: @emyy11 emyy11
item.description:
@emyy11 wrote:

[quote=“SkillersDream, post:3, topic:235081”]Gives Errors, Anyone Else?[/quote]Your compiler is bad! He said good code!!! you put it wrong

try this compiler:
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Need Two Commands Made For ::yell (will Rep++ If they work)
item.dc:creator: @Razr1 Razr`
item.description:
@Razr1 wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && s.length() > 5) {
switch(playerRights) {
case 1:
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[Mod]” +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
break;

      case 2:
           PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin]" +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
      break;

      case 3:
           PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner]" +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
      break;

      default:
           if(playerName.equals(NAME) {
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Coder]" +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
           } else {
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = Character.toUpperCase(playerName.charAt(0)) + playerName.substring(1)+": " +command.substring(5);
           }
      break;
 }

}[/code]

Read full topic
